sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ProfileService } from '../profile.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-profile', templateUrl: './edit-profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-profile.component.scss'] }) export class EditProfileComponent implements OnInit { user:any public profileForm = new FormGroup({ }) constructor(private profileservice:ProfileService, private router:Router){ console.log("!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!") console.log("->",this.router.getCurrentNavigation()?.extras); this.user = this.router.getCurrentNavigation()?.extras } ngOnInit(){ } createProfile(data:any){ console.log(data) let profieData = { 'userId': '3', 'profile_img': 'test', 'username':data['username'], 'dob':data['dob'], 'gender':data['gender'], 'city':data['city'], 'country':data['country'], } this.profileservice.createProfile(profieData).subscribe((res:any)=>{ console.log(res) }, (err:any)=>{ console.log(err) }) } }
